Body:
Is it Possible to upload values to firebase cloud via esp8266 from embedded c code ! My intention is , to upload sensor values which should communicate directly with firebase server ! In the code I am giving the firebase host server with database Secrets as API key ! are the details alone needed to communicate with firebase?

#define F_CPU 16000000UL		#include<avr/io.h>	#include<util/delay.h>	#include "uart.h"	#include"adc.h"		void main()	{	DDRB=0b11111111;	PORTB=0b11111111;	unsigned char digital;	uart_init();	adc_init();	_delay_ms(1000);	uart_string("AT+CWMODE=3\r\n");  \\MODE SELECT	_delay_ms(3000);			uart_string("AT+CWJAP=\"HOTSPOT NAME\"
column9: \"PWD\"\r\n");  \\WIFI PWD AND USERNAME	_delay_ms(5000);	_delay_ms(5000);	_delay_ms(5000);	while(1)	{	digital=getdata(0);   \\READ LDR VALUE		uart_string("AT+CIPSTART=\"TCP\"
column11: 80 "); \CONNECT WITH THINKSPEAK CLOUD _delay_ms(3000); uart_string("AT+CIPSEND=51 "); \TOTAL NO OF CHARACTER TO BE SEND IN BELOW LINK(NOT GREATER THAN OR LESS THAN THE ACTUAL VALUE)(CORRECT VALUE SHLD BE MENTIONED) _delay_ms(100); uart_string("GET /update?api_key=API KEY`enter code here`&field1="); \TYPE API WRITE KEY uart_num(digital); uart_string(" "); _delay_ms(100);`enter code here` uart_string("AT+CIPCLOSE "); \CLOSE _delay_ms(6000); } } "
